ai_explanation.introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is いくじ which you will often hear in conversations about parenting and family life. Dive into understanding how essential this word is for anyone looking to grasp the nuances of Japanese culture and language. Buckle up, and let's make learning Japanese a fun and rewarding experience!
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word 育児 means the act of raising children or child-rearing. It involves taking care of children's day-to-day needs, nurturing their growth, and guiding their development.
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

childcare.MY: ကလေးထိန်းချုပ်ရေး

examples.kanji: 田中さんは育児休暇を取っています。
examples.furigana: 田中(たなか)さんは育児(いくじ)休暇(きゅうか)を取(と)っています。

translations.EN: Mr. Tanaka is on parental leave.
translations.ES: El Sr. Tanaka está de baja por paternidad.
translations.VI: Ông Tanaka đang nghỉ phép nuôi con.
translations.FR: M. Tanaka est en congé parental.
translations.NE: टानाका सान बच्चा हेर्ने बिदामा छन्।
translations.ZH: 田中先生正在休育儿假。
translations.KO: 타나카 씨는 육아 휴가를 받고 있습니다.
translations.TL: Nasa parental leave si Ginoong Tanaka.
translations.MY: တာနာကာဆိုသူက ကလေးပြုစုခွင့်ယူထားတယ်။
translations.HI: तनाका जी मातृत्व अवकाश पर हैं।
translations.FA: آقای تاناکا در تعطیلات والدین است.

examples.kanji: 彼は育児手当を受けています。
examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)は育児(いくじ)手当(てあて)を受(う)けています。

translations.EN: He is receiving a childcare allowance.
translations.ES: Él está recibiendo una asignación para el cuidado de niños.
translations.VI: Anh ấy nhận trợ cấp chăm sóc trẻ em.
translations.FR: Il reçoit une allocation de garde d'enfants.
translations.NE: उनी बाल हेरचाह भत्ता प्राप्त गर्दैछन्।
translations.TL: Siya ay tumatanggap ng allowance para sa pag-aalaga ng bata.
translations.MY: သူက ကလောင်စောင့်ရှောက်ခတွေ့ရနေပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह बाल देखभाल भत्ता प्राप्त कर रहे हैं।
translations.FA: او کمک هزینه نگهداری از کودک دریافت می‌کند.

examples.kanji: 母は育児書を読みます。
examples.furigana: 母(はは)は育児書(いくじしょ)を読み(よ)ます。

translations.ES: La madre lee un libro de crianza.
translations.VI: Mẹ đọc sách nuôi dạy con cái.
translations.FR: Maman lit un livre sur la parentalité.
translations.BN: মা একটুকি শিশু যত্ন সম্পর্কিত বই পড়েন।
translations.TL: Nagbabasa si nanay ng aklat tungkol sa pagpapalaki ng bata.
translations.MY: အမေကကလေးစောင့်ရှောက်ရေးစာအုပ်ကိုဖတ်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: माँ एक पालन-पोषण की किताब पढ़ती हैं।
translations.FA: مادر یک کتاب تربیت فرزند می‌خواند.

examples.furigana: 育児(いくじ)崩壊(ほうかい)があります。

translations.ES: Hay un colapso en la crianza de los hijos.
translations.VI: Có sự sụp đổ trong nuôi con
translations.FR: Il y a un effondrement parental.
translations.TL: Mayroong krisis sa pagpapalaki ng mga bata.
translations.FA: یک شکستگی در نگهداری کودک وجود دارد.

examples.furigana: 育児(いくじ)相談(そうだん)をします。

translations.ES: Consultar sobre el cuidado de los niños.
translations.VI: Có một buổi tư vấn chăm sóc trẻ em.
translations.TL: Magkaroon ng konsultasyon sa pangangalaga ng bata.
translations.MY: ကလေးစောင့်ရှောက်မှု အကြံဉာဏ်ပေးမှုကို ပြုလုပ်ပါသည်။

synonyms: 子育て : こそだて : child rearing
養育 : よういく : bringing up
ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word いくじ are こそだて and よういく. Both こそだて emphasizes the act of nurturing or parenting children, while よういく usually refers to the broad support and care needed in raising children.
antonyms: 無関心 : むかんしん : apathetic
ai_explanation.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word いくじ are むかんしん and ほうき. むかんしん means the lack of concern or interest, while ほうき implies neglect or abandonment, both differing greatly from the responsibilities inherent in いくじ.
